summary: Data scientist (384 hours of certified academic training, >4 years of experience), software developer (>2 year of experience) and entrepreneur in services & technologies for biomedical researchers ([www.digitalmedtools.com](http://www.digitalmedtools.com)), 29 years. Focused in developing software and analytics solutions to create opportunities and solve situations. My multidisciplinary experience, search of personal and professional growth, and flexibility, calmness and creativity under pressure allow me to solve any situation without problems.
skills1: **Programming**: R, Python, R Packages, React, Bootstrap, Javascript, PHP, Laravel (*Advanced*). SQL, C#, Java SE, Django, git (*Medium*). .NET Entity Framework, Angular, NodeJS, Unity (*Basic*).
skills2: **Software Development**: Programming, deployment (*Advanced*). Architecture, planning and evaluation (*Basic*).
skills3: **Data Science**: Data analysis & interpretation, inferential & basic statistics, data exploration & cleaning, machine learning (*Advanced*). Visualization, databases (*Medium*).
skills4: **Software**: R, GitHub, Excel, Azure ML Studio, Minitab, RapidMiner, VS Code (*Advanced*). Stata (*Medium*).
skills5: **Language**: Spanish (Native). English: Reading, writing, listening (*Advanced*). English: speaking (*Basic*).
education1: **Master of systems engineering** (*Post-Graduate, currently studying*): ***Grade: 4,33***. Pontificia Universidad Javeriana, Bogotá. Formation in Data Science and Machine learning: 384 Hours
education3: * Methods and Applications in Analytics II (192 Hours/4 Credits). Grade: 4,5.

developer2: Planning, design & development of a software aimed to ease the search of academic papers using the PICO (Patient, Intervention, Comparison, Outcome) methodology. (Supervisor: Renato Murasaki).

indepSoft2: Entrepreneur in documentation and process optimization services for biomedical researchers. Digital MedTools seeks to provide tools and services that ease any scientific research project in the biomedical area. We are focused on supporting the construction of solid, high-quality and reproducible systematic reviews, using the PRISMA and PICO methodologies.
research3: Design and construction of two digital solutions built in Excel and Visual Basic, for biomedic research: *RevEasy: Medical Systematic Searches Optimizer* and *Screening Tool*
